name: Sewer Flood
description:
The sewers are flooding with filth..

Horror pixel sidescroller/platformer with 2D lights
Fix the pipes to save yourself from a gruesome pixelized death underwater

Gameplay:
* Random pipes leak on bottom floors of the sewer
* The sewer level rises when pipes leak
* Find the cork to plug the leaking pipes and stop the flood!

Controls:
* WASD / Left Joystick - Move
* Space / A - Select/Jump

May and probably does contain bugs

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/sewer-flood-5
